timeline.message: Updated Alert to use the newest version of the Jira library. Modified the JiraIssueHandlers to appropriately use the issue creation response to retrieve the original object

timeline.bodyText: How did we get an IssueResponseModel from the service before this? Was it calling getIssue after creation internally?
timeline.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: IssueCretionResponseModel is newly added. We were originally returning IssueResponseModel but pretty much all the values were empty. except 3-4 of them. So I created this new model to reflect that actual content.
replies.author: bamandel
